body: Hi Iason, I'm not sure if I fully understand the relation between the first question and this comment. Back to EnergySimulationPar I just did a quick test and it works as expected. You can change both the terrain and timestep and they will change inside the .idf file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/mQqoeU*Xt2bZqhWrJh-1w*sPERX4CpXGbz3ERD0UhEKEGYkR7DVJpSnsiVSpeBN*Xk7OgkSbdDKqgnKI17yfxdbOQGxDJ1iU/changeSimulationParameters.PNG) Back to the original post can you help me to understand what is the exact EnergyPlus object that you're trying to change? Do you have a reference idf file? You should probably be able to set it up using additionalStrings_ Mostapha
